# 1989 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1989 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1989 for the 1988 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1989 are as follows.
